name: Vaudeville
storyline: The player plays the role of Detective Martini, a private detective who has come to the city of Vaudeville to solve the mystery of the murders of three people.
summary:
Vaudeville is a detective game in which the player plays the role of Detective Martini, a private detective who has come to the city of Vaudeville to solve the mystery of the murders of three people.

Vaudeville is an experimental whodunit game based on the latest AI technologies.
A tale of murder, suspense and absurdity that unfolds as you play, and you are the protagonist.

videos.name: Announcement Trailer
videos.title: The new frontier of interactive gaming | Vaudeville Demo | AI-driven whodunit
